## Day 3 Activity 

```{r}
# load the libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)

#download data 
toolik_biochem <- read.csv(here::here("data", "2011_kling_Akchem.csv"), na = c(".", "NA")) %>% clean_names()

#subset the data for 1 site 
inlet_biochem <- subset(toolik_biochem, site == "Toolik Inlet")
biochem_data <- dplyr::select(inlet_biochem, p_h, doc_u_m, tdn_u_m)


# find the mean 3 ways 
# 1 way 
mean1 <- apply(X = biochem_data, MARGIN = 2, FUN = mean, na.rm = TRUE)
mean1

# 2 way 
mean2 <- biochem_data %>%  
  summarise(across(where(is.numeric), mean, na.rm = TRUE))
mean2

# 3 way 
mean3 <- vector(mode = "numeric", length = ncol(biochem_data)) #storing output 

for(i in seq_along(biochem_data)) {
  mean3 [i]<- mean(biochem_data[[i]], na.rm = TRUE)
}
mean3

```
